snippet: After becoming only the third No. 4 seed to win a regional, Stony Brook’s baseball team (50-12) is two wins from the College World Series, yet still fighting for respect.
abstract: Stony Brook University’s baseball team, which is preparing for the NCAA tournament super regional against Louisiana State, is two wins from the College World Series, yet still fighting for respect.
lead_paragraph: After becoming only the third No. 4 seed to win a regional, Stony Brook’s baseball team (50-12) is two wins from the College World Series, yet still fighting for respect.

headline.seo: Stony Brook Baseball Grows Its Reputation in Season of Firsts
headline.main: At Stony Brook, Talent if Not the Reputation
headline.print_headline: At Stony Brook, Talent If Not the Reputation
